info.title: Info
info.about.title: About
info.about.blurb: A handy, mobile-first web app for zeroing your rifle and maybe some other stuff when I get around to it.
info.about.a2hs.android: Click the install button to add it to the home screen of your phone, like an app!
info.about.a2hs.ios.title: Add MinuteMan to your homescreen so you can use it like an app!
info.diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
mildotcalc.title: MilDot Calc
mildotcalc.blurb: Enter any two values to determine the third
mildotcalc.errors.atLeastTwoOf: At least two of Mil Size, Physical Size, or Distance are required
mildotcalc.errors.milSize.min: Mil Size must be at least {min} {unit}
mildotcalc.errors.milSize.max: Mil Size must not be greater than {max} {unit}
mildotcalc.errors.physicalSize.min: Physical Size must be at least {min} {unit}
mildotcalc.errors.physicalSize.max: Physical Size must not be greater than {max} {unit}
mildotcalc.errors.distance.min: Target Distance must be at least {min} {unit}
mildotcalc.errors.distance.max: Target Distance must not be greater than {max} {unit}
globalwarning: MinuteMan is best suited for smart phones in portrait orientation
